personalInfo.name: Jhon Doe
personalInfo.careerObjective: Experienced Java developer with four years of experience in Java application development seeking full-time employment with a growing and fast-paced software startup. Proficient in decreasing the startup time for Java-powered applications by 60%.

workExperience.workSummary: Performed unit testing of Java applications by applying test cases in Junit.Improved code inefficiency that resulted in a 25% increase in mobile application stability
